name: A Train Full of Money
description:
In A TRAIN FULL OF MONEY your job is to safely transport money aboard a train across the wild, wild west. Unfortunately for you, bandits and outlaws are upon you, and you've lost control of the train.

The only control you're left with is *SPACEBAR*. Use it to switch tracks. It's that simple. Except it isn't...
The train is steamrolling as long as it has coal to burn. If you run out, the train stops and the bandits take away all the money. 

Pick coal, gold, and dynamite, and try to avoid bandit roadblocks!

Music from: Audionautix
SFX from: freesound.org
Font: Smokum
Assets used:
2D Sprite Outline by Hanna Fiani
Fantasy Wooden GUI: Free by Black Hammer
2d Flat Explosion by Osama Deep
Visual assets by me.
